attributes.action: Daytime Running Lights - NOW - waiting till 2020 for legislature is too long. Compulsory vehicle lighting by day has proven to save life and accidents
attributes.additional_details: It has been decided all new build vehicles have DRL DAYLIGHT OR DAYTIME RUNNING LIGHTS. its expected that this will become law by 2020. Given the well proven life saving benefits of being seen better in all weather conditions. It makes sense to enforce this now and not continue to put motorists and the public at continued risk from those who choose to be inconspicuous in all too often, terrible weather, and poor lighting conditions. Make the selfish camouflaged drivers light up.
